{docbook}
<highlights>
  <itemizedlist>

    <listitem>
      <para>
        <link linkend="Answer_user_guide.Regular_user">Regular user</link>
      </para>
      <para>
        Introduction to the common actions that are for regular users and step-by-step instructions on how to perform
        them, such as submitting/answering/commenting/sharing questions, searching, or editing user settings.
      </para>
    </listitem>
    <listitem>
      <para>
        <link linkend="Answer_user_guide.Moderator">Moderator</link>
      </para>
      <para>
        Introduction to tasks that are for moderators and steps to perform them, such as managing categories, moderating
        questions and answers.
      </para>
    </listitem>
    <listitem>
      <para>
        <link linkend="Answer_user_guide.Administrator">Administrator</link>
      </para>
      <para>
        Introduction to actions that are for administrators only and steps to perform them, such as setting up
        <emphasis role="bold">Answers</emphasis>
        and
        <emphasis role="bold">FAQ</emphasis>
        portlets.
      </para>
    </listitem>
  </itemizedlist>
</highlights>
{docbook}

Before using the features in *Answers*, you should get familiar with the *Answers* interface. Once you have logged in and accessed *Answers*, the interface looks like this:

!images/Answer_screen.png|align="center" width="150mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

|!images/no1.png|width="4mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"! | The *Status* pane displays information of the currently viewed category, including the total number of open questions, pending questions and the total questions.|
|!images/no2.png|width="4mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"! | The *Categories* pane lists all categories in the hierarchical system. With one click on your desired category, you will be directed to the Answers viewing pane.|
|!images/no3.png|width="4mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"! | The *Breadcrumb* bar is to navigate between categories and sub-categories easily. This bar also includes the search box with simple and advanced options.|
|!images/no4.png|width="4mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"! | The *Action* bar is to add categories, questions, and to manage questions, import, export, print, and do settings.|
|!images/no5.png|width="4mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"! | The *Answers Viewing* pane displays all questions and information about score and the number of answers of each question in the selected category.|

Remember that this interface may look different for each user group. Some actions for  advanced users will not be shown in the interface when you log in as a regular user.
